item.title: JAVA8-Collectors API partitioningBy、reducing、summarizingLong、summarizingInt、summarizingDouble
item.description: JAVA8-Collectors API: partitioningBy、reducing、summarizingLong、summarizingInt、summarizingDouble 前置数据： public static final List<Dish> menu = Arrays.asList( new Dish("pork", false, 800, Dish.Type.MEAT), new Dish("beef", false, 700, Dish.Type.MEAT), new Dish("chicken", false, 400, Dish.Type.MEAT), new Dish("french fries", true, 530, Dish.Type.OTHER), new Dish("rice", true, 350, Dish.Type.OTHER), new Dish("season fruit", true, 120, Dish.Type.OTHER), new Dish("pizza", true, 550, Dish.Type.OTHER), new Dish("prawns", false, 300, Dish.Type.FISH), new Dish("salmon", false, 450, Dish.Type.FISH)); 范例： 1、partitioningBy 分组 public static void testPartitioningByWithPredicate() { System.out.println("testPartitioningByWithPredicate"); Map<Boolean, List<Dish>> collect = menu.
